products.title: Turin 25mm Ocean Blue Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Introduce calming ocean blue shades into your space with their aluminium venetian blinds. An all-rounder that will work perfectly with cool greys or as a pop of colour with neutrals and wooden tones. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it fits straight onto upvc frames with no need for screws or drills. products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush River Blue Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their river blue colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce a bright blue colour into their room.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Ink Blue Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. products.title: Cellular Navy Blue Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Metis Solar Light Blue Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Metis solar pleated fabric is available in a wide range of colours and features a silver solar speckled backing. Fantastic for conservatories, hot rooms like offices or even rooms with south-facing windows. A strong blue tone, metis light blue bring feelings of the ocean to your home. Pair with soft breezy scents and light furnishings to create a relaxation room. Product id: db-nfpl0016 fabric colour: light blue material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
